Name: Bill
S28S1V01: Motion that the Report concerning Bill S-8 (An Act to amend the Act respecting the Supreme Court of Canada) be referred back to the Standing Committee on Banking and Commerce
S28S1V02: Motion that the Bill S-15 (An Act to amend the Act on Food and Drugs, and the Act on Narcotics, and by way of consequence, The Criminal Code) be not now read a third time, but amended
S28S1V03: Motion that the Bill C-165 (An Act to amend the Act on Revenue Taxation and the Act on Inheritance Taxation) be now read a second time
S28S1V04: Motion that the debate be adjourned
S28S1V05: Motion that the substitution of Senators on the Standing Committee on Judicial and Constitutional Affairs, be not immediate, but that it be made after the presentation of the Report of the Committee on Bill S-21 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code)
S28S1V06: Motion that the Bill C-150 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code, etc.) be now read a second time
S28S1V07: Motion that the Bill S-21 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code) be now read a third time
S28S1V08: Motion that the Bill S-24 (An Act to amend the Electoral Act (Age of Voters)) be not now read a third time, but be referred to Committee
S28S2V01: Motion that the Bill C-3 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code) be not now read a second time, but be referred to the Supreme Court
S28S2V02: Motion that the Bill C-3 (An Act to amend the Criminal Code) be now read a second time
S28S3V01: Motion that the Bill C-181 (An Act to provide for Special Powers for Keeping Public Order in Canada), be not now read a third time, but be amended
S28S3V02: Motion that the Bill C-181 (An Act to provide for Special Powers for Keeping Public Order in Canada), be not now read a third time, but be referred back to Committee
S28S3V03: Motion that the Senate opposes the Transalaskian Crude Oil Pipeline and the Transport of Crude by Ships, on reasons of safety and efficiency, and that the matters be referred to Committee
S28S3V04: Motion that the debate be adjourned
S28S3V05: Motion that the Rules of Senate 44. 45 & 78 be suspended for the remaining of the sitting for Bills of public interest
S28S3V06: Motion that the Senate adjourn today to the 10th of January 1972
S28S3V07: Motion that the Bill C-259 (An Act to amend the Act on Revenue Taxation) be now read a third time
S28S3V08: Motion that the debate be adjourned to January the 11th 1972
